author: Neha Mewari
title: Telugu Hanuman Jayanti 2024: Date, Time and Significance
text: Telugu Hanuman Jayanti celebrates the birth of Lord Hanuman in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana. It would be celebrated on Saturday, June 1, 2024. This festival will be celebrated with great devotion by a large number of devotees. Telugu Hanuman Jayanti is mainly celebrated in Andhra Pradesh and Telangana. It begins on Chaitra Purnima and continues until the Dashami Tithi of the Jyestha Month. Hanuman Jayanti 2024 Date and Timings: Hanuman Jayanti Saturday, June 1, 2024 Dashami Tithi Begins 07:24 AM, June 01, 2024 Dashami Tithi Ends 05:04 AM, June 02, 2024 Hanuman, born to Anjana and Kesari, both of whom were monkeys, has a divine origin story. Anjana, originally an apsara (celestial nymph) under a curse, was transformed into a monkey. She received a blessing from Lord Shiva that her son would be immortal, possess extraordinary strength, and be a fervent devotee of Lord Rama. Hanuman Jayanti Rituals Deeksha (Vow): On Chaitra Purnima, the full moon day of the Hindu lunar month of Chaitra, devotees commence a 41-day Deeksha. This vow encompasses practices such as fasting, prayers, and self-discipline. Puja Rituals: Preparation: Devotees purify their homes, make early visits to temples, partake in a sacred bath, and don clean attire. Altar setup: They prepare an altar with Lord Hanuman's image or idol, embellishing it with flowers, garlands, and offerings like fruits, sweets, and betel leaves. Prayers and mantras: The Hanuman Chalisa, a 40-verse ode in honor of Hanuman, is recited, along with other mantras dedicated to him. Offering food: Devotees prepare special dishes such as laddus and other sweets to offer to Hanuman as prasad, which is later distributed among family and friends. Aarti: The puja culminates with an aarti, involving the lighting of a lamp and its rotation around the deity accompanied by hymns, signifying the dispelling of darkness and the ushering in of enlightenment and wisdom. Fasting: Many followers fast from dawn to dusk, breaking it only after the evening prayers are concluded. Hanuman Jayanti Significance According to Hindu beliefs, Hanuman Ji is one of the Chiranjeevis, immortal beings who are still present on Earth. He is deeply devoted to Lord Sri Rama and is known for his unwavering loyalty and strength. Lord Hanuman, also known as Bajrangbali, Maruti Nandan, and Sankat Mochan, holds a special place in Hindu mythology. His parents are Mother Anjani and King Kesari. Some consider him to be an incarnation of Lord Shiva (Rudravtar).  ",

author: @Affaritaliani
title: Monfalcone: sindaca leghista chiude luoghi di culto irregolari. Mussulmani protestano - Affaritaliani.it
text: Monfalcone: sindaca leghista chiude luoghi di culto irregolari. Mussulmani protestano Anna Maria Cisint, sindaco leghista, difende i diritti degli italiani cattolici sotto il Natale. Salvini e Fedriga intervengono in videochiamata Monfalcone: la sindaca leghista chiude i luoghi di culto irregolari e i mussulmani protestano Ieri, a Monfalcone (provincia di Gorizia), c’è stata la protesta di almeno 8000 mussulmani contro la sindaca leghista Anna Maria Cisint. A dire il vero i contrasti tra la sindaca e i fedeli di Maometto non sono cominciati certo ieri. Sono anni che la sindaca, meritoriamente, cerca di far capire che chi è stato accolto deve uniformarsi agli usi e costumi dell’accoglitore e non viceversa. Un principio semplice che qualcuno dimentica. Monfalcone oggi presenta un terzo di cittadini di fede mussulmana che si avviano a scalzare i cattolici. Ormai, nel “mondo al contrario” in cui ci troviamo è la sindaca italiana che deve difendere i diritti degli italiani, come dire “originari”, e che non hanno avuto la cittadinanza acquisita. Anna Maria Cisint, sindaco leghista, difende i diritti degli italiani cattolici sotto il Natale La sindaca ha anche vietato alle donne mussulmane di fare il bagno vestite e ha poi criticato la correttezza medica del Ramadan su minori e debilitati. Misure di buon senso. "Al sindaco chiediamo di aprire le sue porte ai cittadini e non a due cittadini su tre, che è quello che sta facendo in questo momento: governare solo una parte della città. Noi siamo disponibilissimi, non abbiamo alcuna preclusione e se ci ascolta possiamo fare anche un cammino insieme" ci fa sapere Bou Konate, politico senegalese in Italia dal 1984 che, bontà sua, dice di “non avere alcuna preclusione”. Monfalcone, Salvini e Fedriga intervengono in videochiamata La sindaca ha risposto per le rime con una doppia videochiamata con il leader della Lega Matteo Salvini e il governatore del FVG Massimiliano Fedriga. "Oggi Monfalcone ha avuto la più evidente dimostrazione della volontà di prevaricazione da parte della comunità musulmana per imporre il proprio modello islamico più integralista. Da un lato, in centro, la voglia di festeggiare il momento più alto della Natività nel quale si riconoscono i principi cristiani, alla base della nostra civiltà, dall'altro un'indecorosa protesta". Ma qual è l’accusa che la sindaca rivolge ai mussulmani? "Non sono in regola con prescrizioni urbanistiche e sull'incolumità pubblica", risponde il Primo cittadino. E segnala anche le "sopraffazioni contro le donne, e le espressioni di violenza che inneggiano al terrorismo palestinese". Dove sono le femministe così pronte contro il supposto patriarcato italiano? Evidentemente c’è qualcuno che si ritiene sopra la legge per il solo fatto di professare una religione diversa. Se –come dice la sindaca- i centri di preghiera islamici non sono in regola con le prescrizioni comunali e statali non si vede perché i mussulmani dovrebbero essere privilegiati rispetto ad una chiesa cattolica con gli stessi problemi. Siamo veramente al rovesciamento dei valori. La democrazia è una bella cosa ma purtroppo non tutti i Paesi del mondo la seguono. Provate solo a costruire una chiesa cristiana in un Paese arabo e poi vedete che fine fate, altro che “illeciti amministrativi”. Naturalmente il Pd è corso subito in soccorso dei manifestanti islamici ed ha dichiarato che la Cisint è una “cattiva maestra”. Quindi democrazia sì ma anello al naso no. La religione italiana è quella cattolica, le altre ci sono, ma non devono certo prevaricare le leggi italiane. Il buon senso, oltre tutto, dice che l’ospite si adegua e non diventa padrone. Un piccolo principio base che in questa pazza epoca di rovesciamento completo dei valori viene spesso dimenticato. [Iscriviti alla newsletter](https://www.deltapictures.it/lp/affaritaliani/iscriviti-alla-newsletter/)

author: Ipsita Pati
title: Gurgaon: Slight relief from biting cold as sun lifts fog cover & wind speed drops | Gurgaon News - Times of India
text: GURGAON: Thursday was the city's day out as bright sunshine and a 5kmph drop in wind speed saw people flocking outdoors to enjoy the respite from the chilly weather. At 15.5 degrees Celsius, the maximum temperature was over 2 notches up from Wednesday's 13.1 degrees, and 4.4 notches below normal. 106751586While cold day conditions are likely for the next two days, some respite is likely after that, according to India Meteorological Department. The city reported its first 'severe cold day' of the season on Wednesday, when icy winds from the snow-clad mountains in Jammu & Kashmir and Himachal Pradesh led to the maximum temperature slipping by 6.6 notches below normal.Meanwhile, Thursday's minimum temperature was 6.9 degrees C, marginally down from the day before (7.5 degrees) and 0.5 degrees above normal. The wind speed dropped to 8kmph, bringing respite from the windchill.According to IMD, a day is classified as 'cold' when the maximum temperature drops 4.5 notches below normal, with the minimum also dipping to single digits. It is a 'severe cold day' when the maximum temperature drops below normal by 6.5 degrees Celsius or more. A 'cold wave' is declared when the minimum temperature of the station is less than 4 degrees Celsius.IMD's forecast slightly changed in the past 24 hours, with the department predicting that cold wave conditions are likely to continue till Friday in the city and abate thereafter. Earlier, it said the windchill was likely till January 14. \"A fresh western disturbance is likely to affect the western Himalayan region from January 16. Dense fog conditions are very likely to prevail for a few hours in the morning over Punjab and Haryana from January 12 to 15. No large change in minimum temperature is expected during this period,\" said an IMD official.As it was sunny the entire day, people were seen outside enjoying the sun in parks, green belts and balconies on Thursday. \"I was feeling cooped up inside my house for the last three days because of the chilly winds. On Thursday, I took my dog out to the park and we spent more than two hours there enjoying the afternoon sun,\" said Dilip Verma, a resident of Sector 90.\"My six-year-old daughter was very excited to play outdoors on Thursday. She has been unwell for the past week because of the weather. I took her to the park around 3pm to play with other children. It was relaxing for her after many gloomy days indoors,\" said Vinita Mohan, a resident of Sector 72.The city's overall air quality index (AQI) deteriorated but remained in the 'moderate' category on Thursday at 191, from 120 the day before.Meanwhile, Delhi woke up to a pleasant winter morning with clear skies on Thursday. The minimum temperature was 5.8 degrees C, while the maximum temperature soared to 18.1 degrees. Delhi's AQI deteriorated to \"very poor\" at 348 on Thursday, against 273 on Wednesday. The air quality early warning system said the air is likely to remain \"very poor\" up to Sunday.

author: @espresotv
title: Polish Foreign Minister: Chinese influence could stop Putin's war in Ukraine
text: Chinese influence could halt Putin's war in Ukraine – Polish Foreign Minister Radosław Sikorski, the Polish Foreign Minister, suggested that China might be able to compel Russian leader Vladimir Putin to halt the war in Ukraine He made these [remarks](https://www.rmf24.pl/raporty/raport-wojna-z-rosja/news-sikorski-niech-putin-zastanawia-sie-co-zrobimy,nId,7490471#crp_state=1) in an interview with the BBC, as reported by RMF 24. Sikorski proposed that the conflict in Ukraine might only cease when Putin realizes that "the cost of its continuation, in terms of human lives and financial expenses, exceeds the objectives he seeks to achieve." Simultaneously, according to the Polish minister, the Ukrainian war won't come to a close anytime soon. "There are various potential mediators - Turkey, the UN. China could indeed pressure Putin to end this war. However, I don't see any indications that Putin is inclined to engage in negotiations," stated Radosław Sikorski. He also highlighted the possibility of the European Union bolstering military assistance to Ukraine. The politician emphasized that the EU's overall financial aid to Ukraine surpasses that of the USA. - US Secretary of State Anthony Blinken [criticized](https://global.espreso.tv/world-news-blinken-china-aids-russian-defense-amid-sanctions-pressure)China for supplying equipment to the Russian defense industry, asserting that the Chinese cannot "play both sides" in efforts to resolve the conflict and enhance relations between Beijing and Europe. - News [More news](https://global.espreso.tv/news?page=2)

author: ABNewswire
title: Spotlight: Stocks Under One Penny Key Updates SPZI, HNRC, ENZC
text: Spotlight: Stocks Under One Penny Key Updates SPZI, HNRC, ENZC, HALB, BIEI JP 3E Holdings Inc. (OTC: SPZI), formerly known as Spooz Inc., gained attention on May 22 when its subsidiary, Power Engineering Corporation (PEC), made a significant announcement. PEC revealed a new joint venture with Bloxcross, aiming to expand its business operations into the MENA region, encompassing sectors such as construction, oil and gas, healthcare, and commodities. The early phases of this joint venture will concentrate on PEC's oil and gas division. It was mentioned that Bloxcross will finance the ongoing trading activities. Houston Natural Resources Corp. (OTC: HNRC) saw a slight correction in its stock on May 22, but it may be poised for a rebound. On May 15, the company disclosed its financial results for the first fiscal quarter ending March 31, 2024. Total revenues for the period reached $4,292,940, marking a 2.7% increase year-over-year. The reported earnings were $2,736,961, a 2.8% rise from the previous year. Hear more from the CEO on The Street Podcast. Listen Now! [https://thestreetreports.com/hnrc-ceo-frank-kristan-shares-insights-on-2023-financials-2024-outlook-digital-asset-gold-token-and-sponsored-spec-nyse-hnra-on-the-street-reports-podcast-tune-in/] Enzolytics Inc. (OTC: ENZC) gained attention on May 22 after announcing a letter of intent with Enogenesis. The agreement focuses on the therapeutic use of Enzolytics Inc.'s Nitric Oxide Compound (NOC). The press release highlighted that initially, the NOC would be integrated with Virogenetics Inc.'s nutraceutical products, a wholly owned subsidiary of Sagaliam Acquisition Corp. The NOC, available in liquid, spray, or solid forms, allows Virogenetics to offer it in drops, pills, or sprays. On May 22, Halberd Corporation (OTC: HALB) announced its collaboration with Athena GTX, which is on the brink of significant breakthroughs to address challenges faced by both military personnel and civilians worldwide. The company highlighted the serious issue of suicide, with 93,000 individuals taking their lives each year in the United States, a problem that extends beyond the military to the general public. Halberd Corporation emphasized that its partnership with Athena GTX is progressing well. Additionally, the company noted that its proprietary technologies and intellectual property are aimed at filling market gaps. Premier Graphene Inc. (OTC: BIEI) has entered the $11.5 trillion graphene industry with groundbreaking achievements in integrating graphene with construction materials. This marks a significant breakthrough in materials science and construction. Extensive research and testing have demonstrated graphene's transformative potential for building materials in global infrastructure projects, particularly in enhancing the quality of hydraulic concrete. This advancement signifies substantial improvements in cement performance and the creation of superior concrete products. The company is also developing unique graphene-based products to meet the demands of various sectors, including aerospace, medicine, and construction. Stocks trading below one cent and active across multiple sectors, companies include: Integrated Solutions Inc. (OTC: IGPK), NSAV Holding Inc. (OTC: NSAV), and Medical Care Technologies Inc.
